title: Eco-Modern House with Garage in Central Gdansk
description: Step into this spacious, eco-conscious family house nestled within Gdansk’s vibrant Srodmiescie district. Boasting six fully soundproofed bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, this 254 sqm energy-efficient home harmoniously blends comfort with sustainability. Ample dining area with natural light, innovative heated driveway, and an underground garage set the contemporary tone for high-urban life. The property’s smart layout offers dedicated workspaces perfect for home offices or creative pursuits.
neighborhood_description: Live just steps from charming parks, leafy playgrounds, and essential city amenities. Srodmiescie’s well-connected public transport network and extensive bike lanes make getting around effortless for professionals and families alike. Enjoy close proximity to reputable schools, diverse cafés, and cultural attractions at the city center’s pulse.
key_features: spacious dining area with natural light
lifestyle_benefits: prime central location for easy commutes
close to urban parks for relaxation
spaces tailored for remote work and digital relaxation
walk or cycle everywhere – freedom from daily driving
target_buyer: Ideal for remote-working families or digital nomads seeking sustainable city living with room for both family and entrepreneurship.
market_positioning: A rare offering in Gdansk’s booming premium urban segment, this house outshines typical flats with unrivaled eco-design, flexible space, and luxe family- or co-living options at a highly competitive-city price.
